title: (x) Western style glyphic serif "El Tonal" - Brothers {Mike F}
content:
This should be easy (except for me, of course). Its a font seen everywhere; for the life of me I can't remember its name.  
Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014211535im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tonal12_6080.jpg)
author: psychopomp

comments.content: Looks like a mix of [Brothers Bold and Bold Alts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014211535/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/brothers/).
